Name: Number of concepts
Description: Number of senses linked to Concepticon

Name: consonant quality size
Description: Number of items of type consonants_by_quality in the inventory.
Feature_Spec: {"id": "ConsonantQualitySize", "name": "consonant quality size", "function": {"class": "cltoolkit.features.phonology.InventoryQuery", "args": ["consonants_by_quality"]}, "type": {"class": "type"}, "note": null, "categories": null, "requires": ["cltoolkit.features.reqs.inventory"]}

Name: vowel quality size
Description: Number of items of type vowels_by_quality in the inventory.
Feature_Spec: {"id": "VowelQualitySize", "name": "vowel quality size", "function": {"class": "cltoolkit.features.phonology.InventoryQuery", "args": ["vowels_by_quality"]}, "type": {"class": "type"}, "note": null, "categories": null, "requires": ["cltoolkit.features.reqs.inventory"]}

Name: vowel size
Description: Number of items of type vowels in the inventory.
Feature_Spec: {"id": "VowelSize", "name": "vowel size", "function": {"class": "cltoolkit.features.phonology.InventoryQuery", "args": ["vowels"]}, "type": {"class": "type"}, "note": null, "categories": null, "requires": ["cltoolkit.features.reqs.inventory"]}

Name: consonant size
Description: Number of items of type consonants in the inventory.
Feature_Spec: {"id": "ConsonantSize", "name": "consonant size", "function": {"class": "cltoolkit.features.phonology.InventoryQuery", "args": ["consonants"]}, "type": {"class": "type"}, "note": null, "categories": null, "requires": ["cltoolkit.features.reqs.inventory"]}

Name: consonant and vowel ratio
Description: Ratio between consonants and vowels in the inventory
Feature_Spec: {"id": "CVRatio", "name": "consonant and vowel ratio", "function": {"class": "cltoolkit.features.phonology.Ratio", "args": ["consonants", "vowels"]}, "type": {"class": "type"}, "note": null, "categories": null, "requires": ["cltoolkit.features.reqs.inventory"]}

Name: consonant and vowel ratio (by quality)
Description: Ratio between consonants_by_quality and vowels_by_quality in the inventory
Feature_Spec: {"id": "CVQualityRatio", "name": "consonant and vowel ratio (by quality)", "function": {"class": "cltoolkit.features.phonology.Ratio", "args": ["consonants_by_quality", "vowels_by_quality"]}, "type": {"class": "type"}, "note": null, "categories": null, "requires": ["cltoolkit.features.reqs.inventory"]}

Name: consonant and vowel ratio (including diphthongs and clusters)
Description: Ratio between consonant_sounds and vowel_sounds in the inventory
Feature_Spec: {"id": "CVSoundRatio", "name": "consonant and vowel ratio (including diphthongs and clusters)", "function": {"class": "cltoolkit.features.phonology.Ratio", "args": ["consonant_sounds", "vowel_sounds"]}, "type": {"class": "type"}, "note": null, "categories": null, "requires": ["cltoolkit.features.reqs.inventory"]}

Name: has nasal vowels or not
Description: Does the inventory contain at least one nasalized vowels.
Feature_Spec: {"id": "HasNasalVowels", "name": "has nasal vowels or not", "function": {"class": "cltoolkit.features.phonology.HasSoundsWithFeature", "args": ["vowels", [["nasalized"]]]}, "type": {"class": "type"}, "note": "same as: WALS 10A", "categories": {"true": "has nasalized vowels", "false": "does not have nasalized vowels"}, "requires": ["cltoolkit.features.reqs.inventory"]}

Name: has rounded vowels or not
Description: WALS Feature 11A, check for front rounded vowels.
Feature_Spec: {"id": "HasRoundedVowels", "name": "has rounded vowels or not", "function": {"class": "cltoolkit.features.phonology.HasRoundedVowels"}, "type": null, "note": "same as: WALS 11A", "categories": {"1": "no high and no mid vowels", "2": "high and mid vowels", "3": "high and no mid vowels", "4": "mid and no high vowels"}, "requires": ["cltoolkit.features.reqs.inventory"]}

Name: has the velar nasal (engma)
Feature_Spec: {"id": "VelarNasal", "name": "has the velar nasal (engma)", "function": {"class": "cltoolkit.features.phonology.HasEngma"}, "type": null, "note": "same as: WALS 9A", "categories": {"1": "velar nasal occurs in syllable-initial position", "2": "velar nasal occurs but not in syllable-initial position", "3": "velar nasal is missing"}, "requires": ["cltoolkit.features.reqs.inventory"]}

Name: voicing and gaps in plosives
Description: WALS Feature 5A, presence of certain sounds.
Feature_Spec: {"id": "PlosiveVoicingGaps", "name": "voicing and gaps in plosives", "function": {"class": "cltoolkit.features.phonology.HasPtk"}, "type": null, "note": "same as: WALS 5A", "categories": {"1": "no p and no g in the inventory", "2": "no g in the inventory", "3": "no p in the inventory", "4": "has less than 6 values of [p t t\u032a k b d d\u032a g]", "5": "has at least 6 values of [p t t\u032a k b d d\u032a g]"}, "requires": ["cltoolkit.features.reqs.inventory"]}

Name: gaps in plosives
Feature_Spec: {"id": "LacksCommonConsonants", "name": "gaps in plosives", "function": {"class": "cltoolkit.features.phonology.LacksCommonConsonants"}, "type": null, "note": "same as: WALS 18A", "categories": {"1": "bilabials and fricatives and nasals occur", "2": "bilabials do not occur, fricatives and nasals occur", "3": "fricatives do not occur, bilabials and nasals occur", "4": "nasals do not occur, bilabials and fricatives occur", "5": "bilabials and nasals do not occur, fricatives occur", "6": "all other cases"}, "requires": ["cltoolkit.features.reqs.inventory"]}

Name: has uncommon consonants
Description: WALS Feature 19A, check for presence of uncommon consonants.
Feature_Spec: {"id": "HasUncommonConsonants", "name": "has uncommon consonants", "function": {"class": "cltoolkit.features.phonology.HasUncommonConsonants"}, "type": null, "note": "same as: WALS 19A", "categories": {"1": "no clicsk and no dental fricatives and no labiovelars and no pharyngeals", "2": "clicks and pharyngeals and dental fricatives", "3": "pharyngeals and dental fricatives", "4": "dentral fricatives", "5": "pharyngeals", "6": "labiovelars", "7": "clicks"}, "requires": ["cltoolkit.features.reqs.inventory"]}

Name: voicing in plosives and fricatives
Description: WALS Feature 4A, check for voiced and unvoiced sounds
Feature_Spec: {"id": "PlosiveFricativeVoicing", "name": "voicing in plosives and fricatives", "function": {"class": "cltoolkit.features.phonology.PlosiveFricativeVoicing"}, "type": null, "note": "same as: WALS 4A", "categories": {"1": "no voicing contrast", "2": "in plosives alone", "3": "in fricatives alone", "4": "in both plosives and fricatives"}, "requires": ["cltoolkit.features.reqs.inventory"]}

Name: presence of uvular consonants
Description: WALS Feature 6A, check for uvular sounds.
Feature_Spec: {"id": "UvularConsonants", "name": "presence of uvular consonants", "function": {"class": "cltoolkit.features.phonology.HasUvular"}, "type": null, "note": "same as: WALS 6A", "categories": {"1": "no uvulars", "2": "has one uvular and this one is a stop", "3": "has one uvular and this one is no stop", "4": "has uvulars"}, "requires": ["cltoolkit.features.reqs.inventory"]}

Name: presence of glottalized consonants
Description: WALS Feature 7A, check for glottalized or implosive consonants.
Feature_Spec: {"id": "GlottalizedConsonants", "name": "presence of glottalized consonants", "function": {"class": "cltoolkit.features.phonology.HasGlottalized"}, "type": null, "note": "same as: WALS 7A", "categories": {"1": "no ejectives, no implosives", "2": "has ejective stops or affricates, but no implosives", "3": "has implosive stops or affricates but no ejectives", "4": "has ejectives resonants", "5": "has ejectives and implosives but no ejective resonants", "6": "has ejectives and ejective resonants, but no implosives", "7": "has implosives and ejective resonants but no ejective stops", "8": "has implosvies, ejective resonants, and ejective stops"}, "requires": ["cltoolkit.features.reqs.inventory"]}

Name: presence of lateral consonants
Description: WALS Feature 8A, check for lateral sounds.
Feature_Spec: {"id": "HasLaterals", "name": "presence of lateral consonants", "function": {"class": "cltoolkit.features.phonology.HasLaterals"}, "type": null, "note": "same as: WALS 8A", "categories": {"1": "no laterals", "2": "only lateral [l]", "3": "has laterals, but no stops in laterals and no [l]", "4": "has laterals, including [l] and stops", "5": "has laterals, inlcuding stops, but no [l]", "6": "has laterals, but no stops and no [l]"}, "requires": ["cltoolkit.features.reqs.inventory"]}

Name: complexity of the syllable structure
Description: WALS Feature 12A, check for syllable complexity.
Feature_Spec: {"id": "SyllableStructure", "name": "complexity of the syllable structure", "function": {"class": "cltoolkit.features.phonology.SyllableStructure"}, "type": null, "note": "same as: WALS 12A", "categories": {"1": "simple syllable structure (only CV attested)", "2": "moderately complex syllable structure (C(C)VC attested)", "3": "complex syllable structure"}, "requires": ["cltoolkit.features.reqs.segments"]}

Name: fist person starts with an m-sound
Description: Check if a language has a form for first_person starting with [m].
Feature_Spec: {"id": "FirstPersonWithM", "name": "fist person starts with an m-sound", "function": {"class": "cltoolkit.features.phonology.StartsWithSound", "args": [["I"], [["bilabial", "nasal"], ["labio-dental", "nasal"]]], "kwargs": {"concept_label": "first_person", "sound_label": "[m]"}}, "type": {"class": "type"}, "note": "similar to: WALS 136B", "categories": {"true": "first_person starts with [m] or similar", "false": "first_person starts with another sound", "null": "missing data"}, "requires": ["cltoolkit.features.reqs.segments"]}

Name: fist person starts with an n-sound
Description: Check if a language has a form for first person starting with [n].
Feature_Spec: {"id": "FirstPersonWithN", "name": "fist person starts with an n-sound", "function": {"class": "cltoolkit.features.phonology.StartsWithSound", "args": [["I"], [["dental", "nasal"], ["retroflex", "nasal"], ["alveolar", "nasal"], ["alveolo-palatal", "nasal"], ["retroflex", "nasal"]]], "kwargs": {"concept_label": "first person", "sound_label": "[n]"}}, "type": {"class": "type"}, "note": "see also: FirstPersonWithM, SecondPersonWithT, SecondPersonWithN, SecondPersonWithM", "categories": {"true": "first person starts with [n] or similar", "false": "first person starts with another sound", "null": "missing data"}, "requires": ["cltoolkit.features.reqs.segments"]}

Name: second person starts with a t-sound
Description: Check if a language has a form for second person starting with [t].
Feature_Spec: {"id": "SecondPersonWithT", "name": "second person starts with a t-sound", "function": {"class": "cltoolkit.features.phonology.StartsWithSound", "args": [["THOU", "THEE (OBLIQUE CASE OF YOU)"], [["dental", "fricative"], ["dental", "affricate"], ["dental", "stop"], ["alveolar", "fricative"], ["alveolar", "affricate"], ["alveolar", "stop"], ["palatal", "fricative"], ["palatal", "affricate"], ["palatal", "stop"], ["alveolo-palatal", "fricative"], ["alveolo-palatal", "affricate"], ["alveolo-palatal", "stop"], ["retroflex", "fricative"], ["retroflex", "affricate"], ["retroflex", "stop"]]], "kwargs": {"concept_label": "second person", "sound_label": "[t]"}}, "type": {"class": "type"}, "note": "see also: FirstPersonWithM, FirstPersonWithN, SecondPersonWithN, SecondPersonWithM", "categories": {"true": "second person starts with [t] or similar", "false": "second person starts with another sound", "null": "missing data"}, "requires": ["cltoolkit.features.reqs.segments"]}

Name: second person starts with an m-sound
Description: Check if a language has a form for second person starting with [m].
Feature_Spec: {"id": "SecondPersonWithM", "name": "second person starts with an m-sound", "function": {"class": "cltoolkit.features.phonology.StartsWithSound", "args": [["THOU", "THEE (OBLIQUE CASE OF YOU)"], [["bilabial", "nasal"], ["labio-dental", "nasal"]]], "kwargs": {"concept_label": "second person", "sound_label": "[m]"}}, "type": {"class": "type"}, "note": "see also: FirstPersonWithM, FirstPersonWithN, SecondPersonWithT, SecondPersonWithN", "categories": {"true": "second person starts with [m] or similar", "false": "second person starts with another sound", "null": "missing data"}, "requires": ["cltoolkit.features.reqs.segments"]}

Name: second person starts with an n-sound
Description: Check if a language has a form for second person starting with [n].
Feature_Spec: {"id": "SecondPersonWithN", "name": "second person starts with an n-sound", "function": {"class": "cltoolkit.features.phonology.StartsWithSound", "args": [["THOU", "THEE (OBLIQUE CASE OF YOU)"], [["dental", "nasal"], ["retroflex", "nasal"], ["palatal", "nasal"], ["alveolo-palatal", "nasal"], ["alveolar", "nasal"]]], "kwargs": {"concept_label": "second person", "sound_label": "[n]"}}, "type": {"class": "type"}, "note": "see also: FirstPersonWithM, FirstPersonWithN, SecondPersonWithT, SecondPersonWithM", "categories": {"true": "second person starts with [n] or similar", "false": "second person starts with another sound", "null": "missing data"}, "requires": ["cltoolkit.features.reqs.segments"]}

Name: mother starts with m-sound
Description: Check if a language has a form for MOTHER starting with [m].
Feature_Spec: {"id": "MotherWithM", "name": "mother starts with m-sound", "function": {"class": "cltoolkit.features.phonology.StartsWithSound", "args": [["MOTHER"], [["bilabial", "nasal"]]], "kwargs": {"concept_label": null, "sound_label": "[m]"}}, "type": {"class": "type"}, "note": "see also: FatherWithP", "categories": {"true": "MOTHER starts with [m] or similar", "false": "MOTHER starts with another sound", "null": "missing data"}, "requires": ["cltoolkit.features.reqs.segments"]}

Name: wind starts with f-sound
Description: Check if a language has a form for WIND starting with [f].
Feature_Spec: {"id": "WindWithF", "name": "wind starts with f-sound", "function": {"class": "cltoolkit.features.phonology.StartsWithSound", "args": [["WIND"], [["labio-dental", "fricative"], ["labio-dental", "affricate"]]], "kwargs": {"concept_label": null, "sound_label": "[f]"}}, "type": {"class": "type"}, "note": null, "categories": {"true": "WIND starts with [f] or similar", "false": "WIND starts with another sound", "null": "missing data"}, "requires": ["cltoolkit.features.reqs.segments"]}

Name: inventory has pre-nasalized consonants
Description: Does the inventory contain at least one pre-nasalized consonants.
Feature_Spec: {"id": "HasPrenasalizedConsonants", "name": "inventory has pre-nasalized consonants", "function": {"class": "cltoolkit.features.phonology.HasSoundsWithFeature", "args": ["consonants", [["pre-nasalized"]]]}, "type": {"class": "type"}, "note": null, "categories": {"true": "has pre-nasalized consonants", "false": "does not have pre-nasalized consonants"}, "requires": ["cltoolkit.features.reqs.inventory"]}

Name: inventory has labio-dental fricatives or affricates
Description: Does the inventory contain at least one labio-dental fricative  or labio-dental affricate consonants.
Feature_Spec: {"id": "HasLabiodentalFricatives", "name": "inventory has labio-dental fricatives or affricates", "function": {"class": "cltoolkit.features.phonology.HasSoundsWithFeature", "args": ["consonants", [["labio-dental", "fricative"], ["labio-dental", "affricate"]]]}, "type": {"class": "type"}, "note": null, "categories": {"true": "has labio-dental fricative  or labio-dental affricate consonants", "false": "does not have labio-dental fricative  or labio-dental affricate consonants"}, "requires": ["cltoolkit.features.reqs.inventory"]}

Name: father starts with p-sound
Description: Check if a language has a form for FATHER starting with [p].
Feature_Spec: {"id": "FatherWithP", "name": "father starts with p-sound", "function": {"class": "cltoolkit.features.phonology.StartsWithSound", "args": [["FATHER"], [["bilabial", "stop"], ["labio-dental", "fricative"]]], "kwargs": {"concept_label": null, "sound_label": "[p]"}}, "type": {"class": "type"}, "note": "see also: MotherWithM", "categories": {"true": "FATHER starts with [p] or similar", "false": "FATHER starts with another sound", "null": "missing data"}, "requires": ["cltoolkit.features.reqs.segments"]}

Name: complexity of the syllable onset
Description: Check for syllable complexity onset (based on APICS 118).
Feature_Spec: {"id": "SyllableOnset", "name": "complexity of the syllable onset", "function": {"class": "cltoolkit.features.phonology.SyllableOnset"}, "type": null, "note": "same as: APICS 118", "categories": {"1": "simple syllable onset (only CV attested)", "2": "moderately complex syllable onset (C(C)V attested)", "3": "complex syllable onset"}, "requires": ["cltoolkit.features.reqs.segments"]}

Name: complexity of the syllable offset
Description: Check for syllable complexity offset (based on APICS 119).
Feature_Spec: {"id": "SyllableOffset", "name": "complexity of the syllable offset", "function": {"class": "cltoolkit.features.phonology.SyllableOffset"}, "type": null, "note": "same as: APICS 118", "categories": {"1": "simple syllable offset (only CV attested)", "2": "moderately complex syllable offset (CVC attested)", "3": "slightly complex syllable offset (CV(C)C attested)", "4": "complex syllable offset"}, "requires": ["cltoolkit.features.reqs.segments"]}
